ai-thag5.5:1.1_0: Actually, it turned out to be a good thing,
ai-thag5.5:1.2_0: how my mother spurred me on.
ai-thag5.5:2.2_0: master of the three knowledges, seer of the deathless.
ai-thag5.5:2.3_0: I’ve conquered the army of Namuci,
ai-thag5.5:3.2_0: and my defilements have given me.
ai-thag5.5:4.3_0: ‘Surely someone who sees your things must have been someone else,
ai-thag5.5:5.2_0: this bag of bones is my last
ai-thag5.5:5.4_0: Now there is no further existence.”
